Plantation.Nova Southeastern University College of: Nova Southeastern University College of Osteopathic Medicine (NSUCOM) is a private, non-profit medical school for osteopathic medicine located in Davie, in the U.S. state of Florida. Founded in 1979 as the only osteopathic medical school located in the Southeastern United States, the college is an academic division of Nova Southeastern University. NSUCOM confers the Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine degree, and is accredited by the American Osteopathic Association’s Commission on Osteopathic College Accreditation.
